email.invalidFormat.translation: Email domain must be in valid format

input.maxLength.translation: {content, select, undefined{Must} other {{content} must} } be less than {characterCount} characters long

input.minLength.translation: {content} must be at least {characterCount} characters long

password.charRestrictions.translation: Password must contain at least one numeric digit, one special character, and one uppercase and one lowercase letter
